mapper.sql: TABLE_ID, DATASOURCE_ID, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_CODE, DEMO, REMOVE_STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT
mapper.select: select a.TABLE_ID, a.DATASOURCE_ID, a.TABLE_NAME, a.TABLE_CODE, a.DEMO, a.REMOVE_STATUS, a.CREATED_BY, a.CREATED_DT, a.UPDATED_BY, a.UPDATED_DT, b.DATASOURCE_NAME FROM rpt_data_table a left join rpt_datasource b on a.DATASOURCE_ID = b.DATASOURCE_ID where a.TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into rpt_data_table (TABLE_ID, DATASOURCE_ID, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_CODE, DEMO, REMOVE_STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT) values (#{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

TABLE_ID,

mapper.update:
update rpt_data_table
DATASOURCE_ID = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TABLE_CODE = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEMO = #{demo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMOVE_STATUS = #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update rpt_data_table set DATASOURCE_ID = #{datasourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TABLE_NAME = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_CODE = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEMO = #{demo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMOVE_STATUS = #{removeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TABLE_ID = #{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
